00017 #ifndef FOLDER_H
00018 #define FOLDER_H
00019 
00020 #include <stream.h>

00026 #include "song.h"
00027 #include "songentry.h"
00028 #include "mylist.h"
00029 
00030 // represents a folder on the left
00031 // a folder can
00032 // - contain subfolders
00033 // - have a popup-menu
00034 // - can contain items
00035 class Folder : public QObject, public QListViewItem
00036 {
00037     Q_OBJECT
00038     
00039 public:
00040     Folder      (QListView *parent, const QString &name );                      // top-level folder
00041     Folder      (QListViewItem *parent, const QString &name );              // subfolder
00042     ~Folder()   {};
00043     virtual     void update(MyList* allSongs);                  // common update method
00044 
00045     Song*           firstSong();
00046     Song*           nextSong();
00047 
00048     void            addSong(Song* s)                    { songList.append(new SongEntry(s)); }  // adds a Song as simple SongEntry
00049     void            addEntry(SongEntry* entry)  { songList.append(entry); }                         // adds a given SongEntry
00050     
00051     void            clearSongs()                        { songList.clear(); }                       // clear songlist
00052     void            removeSongEntry(SongEntry* entry )  { songList.removeRef(entry); }          // removes an item(=Song)
00053 
00054     QString     folderName()                { return fName; }
00055     SongEntry* firstEntry()                     { return songList.first(); }
00056     SongEntry* nextEntry()                      { return songList.next(); }
00057 
00058     void popup(QPoint point, QPopupMenu* contentMenu);
00059     QPopupMenu* folderPopup;
00060     QPopupMenu* allPopup;
00061     MyList songList;
00062 
00063 public slots:
00064     void enqueueFolder();
00065     void burnFolder();
00066 
00067 signals:
00068     void EnqueueFolder();
00069     void BurnFolder();
00070 
00071 protected:
00072     QString fName;
00073 };
